08-JUN-2003 AS, major revision
ICA803_02 is NOT generating the query, executing it and sending the mail anymore
Instead of that it generates XML with all the selection and range data and puts
that in a queue (special directory).
Divide and conquer!
Author: Marc Bauschlicher (MB)

... session validated
get a temporary filename on local disk, where we generate the xml request
error#1 problems getting temp. filename
generate the request xml
error#2 problems generating xml request (merge)
additional, paranoid, check
error#3 no output produced (xml merge to temp. file(
determine final destination for ICA803 XML request and copy the file there
error#4 problems copying temp. file to final destination GNRD(33)
error#5 UFB533 failed
additional, paranoid, check
error#6 final file does not exist ...
//27-06-2003 JP SCR #3717 send email if error occurs
//if no error occurs handle request
26-JUN-2003 AS, generating mail to operator for testing purposes ...
Disabled, will be done in the calling program

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('The following error occured:')&' '&CASE ({0,26},1,{0,27},2,{0,28},3,{0,29},4,{0,30},5,{0,31},6,{0,32},'undefined error')&' '&MlsTrans ('for session-id:')&' '&Trim ({0,1})

Text.val: the names of the selected columns are passed in as global variables and
are retrieved from the heap with GETPARAM(). This task queries their names
from SYS:QCOL_COLUMNS and writes their IDs into temp table (memory)
Finance / Limit requires finance or credit limit >0 so add that as well
